name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps by pressing a barbell away from the chest while lying on a bench.

name: Squat
description: A lower body exercise that primarily targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes by bending the knees and hips to lower the body, then returning to standing.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound movement that works the back, glutes, and hamstrings by lifting a barbell from the ground to hip level.

name: Shoulder Press
description: An upper body exercise that targets the deltoids by pressing a weight overhead from shoulder height.

name: Pull-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the upper back and biceps by pulling the body upward while hanging from a bar.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps by curling a weight toward the shoulder.

name: Tricep Dip
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps by lowering and raising the body using parallel bars or a bench.

name: Lunge
description: A lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes by stepping forward and lowering the hips.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise that involves maintaining a push-up position to strengthen the abdominals and lower back.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A machine exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi by pulling a bar down toward the chest.
